constituent: anxiety, fire, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: The existential condition of anxiety that arises from the inevitable frustration of our worldly passions is contained in this character. The head is set afire, causing deep torment of spirit (and a whopper of a headache).
koohiiStory1: An anxiety feels like FIRE in the HEAD.
koohiiStory2: Many performers get "Michael Jackson anxiety" wherein they fear their head will catch on fire.
readingExamples: 煩雑 (はんざつ), 煩う (わずら.う), 煩わす (わずら.わす)
